channel.description: Inventory commands: To view the inventory, specify the inventory file such as ~/base/inventory in the command line. You can name the inventory file anything you want. You can also set the default in the ansible.cfg file. View the current inventory: ansible -i inventory <pattern> --list-hosts List inventory hosts in JSON format: ansible-inventory -i inventory --list Display overview of hosts as a graph: ansible-inventory -i inventory --graph In our lab example:
